about.heroTitle: Bringing Nature's Best to Your Table
about.heroDesc: At Khadyobitan, we believe in the healing power of real, unprocessed food. Our journey began with a simple question: why is it so hard to find genuinely pure, organic products? So we set out to change that.
about.missionDesc1: We source directly from certified organic farms to ensure every product that reaches you is 100% authentic. No middlemen, no compromises â€” just nature's purest offerings delivered fresh to your doorstep.
about.missionDesc2: From the Himalayan salt mines to local beekeepers, every sourcing relationship is built on trust, transparency, and a shared commitment to quality.
about.organicDesc: Every product is certified organic, free from chemicals and pesticides.
about.healthFirstDesc: We believe nutrition should come from nature, not factories.
about.labTestedDesc: All products undergo rigorous quality and purity testing.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.q1: Are all your products truly organic?
faq.a1: Yes, every product we sell is certified organic. We source directly from verified organic farms and each batch undergoes lab testing to ensure purity and quality.
faq.q2: Where are your products sourced from?
faq.a2: Our products come from trusted farms and suppliers across the globe â€” Himalayan salt from the Himalayan Mountains, chia seeds from organic farms, dates from the Middle East, and honey from local beekeepers.
faq.q3: Do your products contain preservatives or chemicals?
faq.a3: Absolutely not. All our products are 100% natural with zero added chemicals, preservatives, or artificial ingredients.
faq.q4: How do you ensure product freshness?
faq.a4: We maintain strict cold-chain logistics and use eco-friendly, airtight packaging. Each product has a clearly marked best-before date.
